last_phrase: In conclusion, the practice of concentration and magnetism requires discipline and focus. Specific physical postures and hand motions can aid in achieving a state of concentration, while symptoms such as itching and sweating can indicate the dominant force of one's blood. It's important to pay attention to the body's responses and react accordingly. With consistent practice and self-awareness, one can improve their ability to concentrate and harness their inner magnetism.
